name: BEPANTHEN OINTMENT NAPPY RASH 100g BABY OINTMENT [Expiry 03/2024]
description:
Expiry : 31 Mar 2024

Product Descriptions: BEPANTHEN OINTMENT 100G
Product Reg Number: MAL 20000874X


Uses:
‚Ä¢ Protect and promote natural healing of your baby‚Äôs delicate skin, against nappy rash
‚Ä¢ Treatment of sore/cracked nipples, dry, chapped and cracked skin
‚Ä¢ Suitable for minor skin injuries as it‚Äôs free from fragrance, preservatives and colorants!

Product Description:
Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment, is a suitable solution for diaper rash as an ointment base formulation offers better protection against nappy (diaper) wetness.
Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment contains the active ingredient dexpanthenol which is converted in skin cells to pantothenic acid. Pantothenic acid or vitamin B5 is known for its skin healing and repairing properties, and as such plays a part in both the formation and the regeneration of the skin.

Hence, Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment has a dual action benefit:
- Protection - Bepanthen Ointment forms a long-lasting breathable barrier protecting against the   
  irritants that cause nappy rash.
- Gentle healing - Dexpanthenol penetrates deeply into the skin and accelerates the natural healing  
   process from within

How should Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment be used?  
- Infant care: At each nappy (diaper) changes, spread over your baby's bottom and groin, after cleaning these areas 
  thoroughly with water. 
- Nursing mothers: Apply to the nipples after each breast feeding. It is recommended to clean the breast before each 
  breastfeeding.
- Damaged skin: Apply one or more times daily, as need.
- Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment may be used during pregnancy and while breastfeeding. 

What does Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment contain?
Each gram contains 50mg of dexpanthenol. NO ADDED COLOURANT, FRAGRANCE & PRESERVATIVE.

Warnings:
- It is important that you follow the dosage instructions contained in the leaflet. Should you feel that this
  product is too weak or too strong, consult your physician or pharmacist.
- Close tube tightly after use and store where it will be protected from heat and out of reach of children. 
- This medicine should not be used after the expiry date (EXP) shown on the pack. 
- You can obtain further information from your physicians or pharmacist.

description:
For the relief of pain and discomfort of common mouth ulcers, cold sores, denture sore spots, infant teething and mouth ulcers, and sore spots due to orthodontic devices in children.
To aid healing of sore spots and ulcers due to dentures in adults and orthodontic devices in children.
By topical application to the oral mucosa.

Adults:
Using a clean finger, massage approximately one centimeter of the gel onto the sore area, not more than once every 3 hours.
Children (from four months): Using a clean finger, massage a pea size amount of gel onto the sore area, not more than once every 3 hours. Do not apply more than six doses in any 24 hour period. Not suitable for infants under four months.
Do not exceed the stated dose.

Orthodontic devices:
Apply to the sore area as described above, not more than once every 3 hours.

Denture irritation:
Apply and leave at least 30 minutes before re-insertion of the dentures. Do not apply this product directly to the dentures.

name: PUREEN REKITO MOSQUITO REPELLENT LIQUID 75ML SPRAY ANTI MOSQUITO NYAMUK
description:
Pureen REKITO MOSQUITO REPELLENT LIQUID 75ml (Exp 2023)
Features:

Active Ingredient in Pureen Rekito Mosquito Repellent Liquid:- 
Ethyl Butylacetylaminopropionate (20% w/w) 

Ethyl Butylacetylaminopropionate is an effective repellent against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, wasps, bees and lice. It has been used as an insect repellent in Europe for more than 20 years. It is classified as Biopesticide* by U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. It can be used on skin and clothing.

* Biopesticide usually inherently less toxic than Conventional Pesticide such as DEET. 
Biopesticide decomposes quickly thereby avoiding the pollution problems caused by Conventional Pesticide.
DEET Free
DEET (Diethyl Toluamide) is a chemical. It is commonly used in repellent products. However, people are concerned about its potential toxicity to humans. DEET has been found to inhibit the activity of central nervous system.
Alcohol Free
Does not irritate skin; gentle on the skin.
Effective in Repelling Mosquitoes
Based on a test carried out by Unit of Medical Entomology/WHO Collaboration Center, Pureen Rekito Mosquito Repellent Liquid was found to be as effective as the test standard 10% DEET. Adult mosquitoes Aedes aegypti (L) were used in the test.
Safe for children
Recommended for children of age 1 year and above.
Formulated with Hamamelis virginiana Flower Extract (Witch Hazel)
Soothes the skin.
Non-greasy and non-sticky formula
Comfortable for the users.
Usage Instruction:

For best results, spray onto exposed areas of skin or clothing every 4 hours. Do not apply to skin that is under clothing.
Do not spray directly to the face. Spray on hands and then rub them carefully over the face, avoiding eyes and mouth. Apply sparingly around the ears.
When use on a child, apply to your hands and then rub them on the child. Do not apply to child‚Äôs hands because he tends to put them in his mouth.
Recommended for children of age 1 year and above.
FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

USE UNDER ADULT SUPERVISION.
Do not apply over cuts, wounds or irritated skin.
In case of contact with eyes, flush with water. If ingested, drink plenty of water. If irritation persists, seek medical attention.
Pack Size: 75ml

name: Buds - Travel Set (For Kids) 75ml (Expiry Feb 2025)
description:
Expiry Date for Orange Travel Set : Feb 2025
Expiry Date for Lavender Travel Set: Feb 2025

Buds Organics Travel Set, Shampoo & Shower Gel 75ML (Orange / Lavender)

What makes Buds For Kids special?

At Buds for Kids we promise to look after you and our planet. We do this by making our products with plant based ingredients and avoiding chemicals. The chemicals in other products for kids can be very dangerous and can harm you and our planet. We chose to use as many organic ingredients as possible as these are grown without hurting our planet. As we know you are bound to love animals too, we do not test our products on animals or buy ingredients tested on animals. Because you are smart, we also know you will want proof that we promise to keep doing this. That is why we applied to become EcoCert certified. EcoCert is like sitting for an exam at school; and they test us every year to make sure we are keeping our promise to you!

Not just organic, but ECOCERT certified organic?

We are 100% committed to achieving (and maintaining) the highest possible standard of quality, safety and earthfriendliness in our products. That‚Äôs why we have chosen to be certified organic by ECOCERT France. Our products are formulated and manufactured using only certified organic and approved natural ingredients according to ECOCERT‚Äôs strict organic standards.

What do the label means?

Some shampoos and shower gels may claim to be natural and organic, but do you know that these may still contain nasty chemicals? Our products are different ‚Äì we make sure only things that are good for your skin go in there, and that is the reason why we get Ecocert to certify our products!! Ecocert makes sure that at least 95% of the plant ingredients are certified organic and that it contains no nasty chemicals. So the next time you are looking for a new shower gel, shampoo or conditioner, check our Nasties list and look for the Ecocert logo. At Buds for Kids, we know that children make great eco-warriors, and this line of earth friendly products are created specially for them. We use only plant-based ingredients which have been cultivated organically, leaving very little carbon footprints on earth. Reducing, reusing and recycling is an important part of our business practice.

WE PROMISE THAT WE WILL NEVER USE:

‚Ä¢ Steroids ‚Ä¢ PEG ‚Ä¢ Propylene glycol ‚Ä¢ Petrochemicals ‚Ä¢ Sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS) ‚Ä¢ Sodium laureth sulphate (SLES) ‚Ä¢ Parabens ‚Ä¢ Phenoxyethanol ‚Ä¢ Formaldehyde ‚Ä¢ Artificial colours ‚Ä¢ Artificial fragrances ‚Ä¢ Ingredients tested on animals ‚Ä¢ Animal-derived ingredients.

Benefits
Keeping little worriors green and clean.
Buds for Kids Shower Gel and Shampoo is mild and gentle yet cleans effectively. Our planet and kid friendly ingredients include Aloe Vera for moisturisation and Lavender for a lovely soothing sense of calmness.

Shower Gel 75 ml +

Recommendation
For kids 3 years old and above

name: Bepanthen Ointment 30g/100g for Baby skin & nursing
description:
Product Description
Uses:
‚Ä¢	Protect and promote natural healing of your baby‚Äôs delicate skin, against nappy rash
‚Ä¢	Treatment of sore/cracked nipples, dry, chapped and cracked skin
‚Ä¢	Suitable for minor skin injuries as it‚Äôs free from fragrance, preservatives and colorants!

Product Description:
Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment, is a suitable solution for diaper rash as an ointment base formulation offers better protection against nappy (diaper) wetness.
Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment contains the active ingredient dexpanthenol which is converted in skin cells to pantothenic acid. Pantothenic acid or vitamin B5 is known for its skin healing and repairing properties, and as such plays a part in both the formation and the regeneration of the skin.

Hence, Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment has a dual action benefit:
- Protection - Bepanthen Ointment forms a long-lasting breathable barrier protecting against the   
  irritants that cause nappy rash.
- Gentle healing - Dexpanthenol penetrates deeply into the skin and accelerates the natural healing  
   process from within

How should Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment be used?  
- Infant care: At each nappy (diaper) changes, spread over your baby's bottom and groin, after cleaning these areas 
  thoroughly with water. 
- Nursing mothers: Apply to the nipples after each breast feeding. It is recommended to clean the breast before each 
  breastfeeding.
- Damaged skin: Apply one or more times daily, as need.
- Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment may be used during pregnancy and while breastfeeding. 

What does Bepanthen¬Æ Ointment contain?
Each gram contains 50mg of dexpanthenol. NO ADDED COLOURANT, FRAGRANCE & PRESERVATIVE.

Warnings:
- It is important that you follow the dosage instructions contained in the leaflet. Should you feel that this
  product is too weak or too strong, consult your physician or pharmacist.
- Close tube tightly after use and store where it will be protected from heat and out of reach of children. 
- This medicine should not be used after the expiry date (EXP) shown on the pack. 
- You can obtain further information from your physicians or pharmacist.

Active Ingredient in Pureen Rekito Mosquito Repellent Liquid:-

1) Ethyl Butylacetylaminopropionate (20% w/w)

Ethyl Butylacetylaminopropionate is an effective repellent against mosquitoes, ticks, flies, wasps, bees and lice. It has been used as an insect repellent in Europe for more than 20 years.It is classified as Biopesticide* by U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. It can be used on skin and clothing.

* Biopesticide usually inherently less toxic than Conventional Pesticide such as DEET. Biopesticide decomposes quickly thereby avoiding the pollution problems caused by Conventional Pesticide.

2)DEET FreeDEET (Diethyl Toluamide) is a chemical. It is commonly used in repellent products. However, people are concerned about its potential toxicity to humans. DEET has been found to inhibit the activity of central nervous system.

3) Alcohol FreeDoes not irritate skin; gentle on the skin.Effective in Repelling Mosquitoes

Based on a test carried out by Unit of Medical Entomology/WHO Collaboration Center, Pureen Rekito Mosquito Repellent Liquid was found to be as effective as the test standard 10% DEET. Adult mosquitoes Aedes aegypti (L) were used in the test.

4) Safe for childrenRecommended for children of age 1 year and above.

5) Formulated with Hamamelis virginiana Flower Extract (Witch Hazel)Soothes the skin.Non-greasy and non-sticky formulaComfortable for the users.
